In late 2013, Dan Kelley started experimenting with blogging, creating a WordPress blog. Finding the WordPress data entry scheme being somewhat arduous, and disliking the lock-in to a commercial site, he started experimenting with github blogging in early 2014, yielding the entries provided below.
